name: Image
content: # Image This tag is used to embed images into a web page. This image tag `` has two required attributes: * `src` - Specifies the path to the image * `alt` - Specifies an alternate text for the image, if the image for some reason cannot be displayed. * `height` - Specifies the height of the image in pixels. * `width` - Specifies the width of the image in pixels.

short_description:
Image
This tag is used to embed  images into a web page. This image tag <img> has two required attributes:
 src - Specifies the path to the image
 alt - Specifies an alternate text for the image, if the image for some reason cannot be displayed. 
 height - Specifies the height of the image in pixels.
 width - Specifies the width of the image in pixels.
tips: * This `` tag must not contain any content, and it does not require a closing tag. * Make sure to put quotation marks around your image filename. * The common extensions of an image file are .jpg, .jpeg, and .png, and the source of an image could also be a URL. * Make sure to give your image file a name that describes what the image is about.
